[requires]
cpython/3.12.2
cmake/3.29.7
expat/2.6.2
openssl/1.1.1w
patchelf/0.13
zlib/1.2.13

[options]
# statically link by default
*:shared=False
# make shared libs for python
cpython/*:shared=True
cpython/*:with_tkinter=False
cpython/*:optimizations=True
# make shared lib for expat (CentOS support)
expat/*:shared=True
